resources.string: Lab3
Day %1$d
Short games for every day
A Short Hike
A relaxing exploration game about climbing a mountain.

A Short Hike is a cozy indie game focused on exploration and relaxation. You play as a character hiking through a peaceful island, meeting other hikers, collecting items, and slowly climbing toward the mountain peak.
Abzû
A beautiful underwater adventure with a focus on atmosphere.
Abzû is an artistic exploration game set in the ocean depths. The player swims through stunning underwater environments, discovering marine life and ancient secrets without combat or dialogue.
Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons
An emotional adventure controlled with two characters.
Brothers tells the story of two siblings on a dangerous journey to save their father. The game uses a unique control scheme that strengthens its emotional impact and storytelling.
Dear Esther
A narrative-driven exploration experience.
Dear Esther is a walking simulator that focuses on storytelling through environment and narration. The player explores a remote island while uncovering fragments of a mysterious story.
Donut County
A humorous puzzle game about a growing hole.
Donut County is a physics-based puzzle game where you control a hole in the ground that swallows objects. The game combines simple mechanics with charming humor and storytelling.
Far: Lone Sails
A calm journey across a ruined world.
Far: Lone Sails is an atmospheric adventure where you guide a vehicle across desolate landscapes. The game focuses on solitude, environmental storytelling, and emotional atmosphere.
Firewatch
A story-driven mystery set in the wilderness.
Firewatch places the player in the role of a fire lookout in a remote forest. Through exploration and dialogue, the game tells a personal and emotional story.
Florence
An interactive story about love and relationships.
Florence is a short narrative game that tells a heartfelt story through simple interactions and visuals. It focuses on everyday moments and emotional connections.
Gone Home
Explore an empty house and uncover a family story.
Gone Home is a first-person exploration game where the player investigates a deserted house. By examining objects and notes, a personal story slowly unfolds.
GRIS
A visually stunning platformer about emotions.
GRIS is an artistic platformer that tells an emotional story through color, music, and animation. The game avoids text and focuses on visual storytelling.
Inside
A dark and atmospheric puzzle platformer.
Inside is a story-driven puzzle platformer with a mysterious and unsettling atmosphere. The game relies on visuals and sound to tell its story without dialogue.
Journey
A silent adventure across vast deserts.
Journey is an exploration game focused on emotion and discovery. Players travel through a desert toward a distant mountain, occasionally meeting other anonymous players.
Katana ZERO
A fast-paced action game with a deep story.
Katana ZERO combines stylish combat with a psychological narrative. The game features fast action, time manipulation, and a strong focus on storytelling.
Kentucky Route Zero
A surreal narrative adventure.
Kentucky Route Zero is a story-focused game inspired by magical realism. It presents a strange and emotional journey through a mysterious version of rural America.
Limbo
A minimalist puzzle platformer.
Limbo is a dark and atmospheric platformer known for its simple visuals and challenging puzzles. The story is told entirely through the environment.
Little Nightmares
A creepy platformer with horror elements.
Little Nightmares is a puzzle platformer that blends horror and atmosphere. Players guide a small character through disturbing environments full of danger.
Night in the Woods
A narrative game about life and friendship.
Night in the Woods focuses on characters, dialogue, and themes of adulthood. The game explores mental health, relationships, and small-town life.
OneShot
A unique game that breaks the fourth wall.
OneShot is a puzzle adventure that directly interacts with the player. The game uses unusual mechanics to create a strong emotional connection.
Oxenfree
A supernatural story with dialogue choices.
Oxenfree is a narrative adventure featuring a group of friends on a mysterious island. Player choices influence dialogue and story outcomes.
Papers, Please
A game about decisions and moral choices.
Papers, Please puts the player in the role of a border officer. The game challenges players with ethical decisions under pressure.
Return of the Obra Dinn
A detective mystery aboard a ghost ship.
Return of the Obra Dinn is a unique investigation game where players uncover the fate of a missing ship crew using logic and deduction.
Sayonara Wild Hearts
A colorful musical arcade experience.
Sayonara Wild Hearts is a fast-paced rhythm game blending music, visuals, and emotion into a short but memorable experience.
Superhot
Time moves only when you move.
Superhot is a minimalist shooter where time progresses only when the player moves. This mechanic creates a unique and strategic experience.
The Beginner’s Guide
A reflective narrative about game creation.
The Beginner’s Guide explores the relationship between a creator and their work. The game is deeply personal and narrative-focused.
The Stanley Parable
A humorous and philosophical exploration.
The Stanley Parable is an interactive narrative that plays with player choice and storytelling. It constantly challenges expectations.
The Vanishing of Ethan Carter
A mysterious first-person investigation.
The Vanishing of Ethan Carter is a narrative game focused on exploration and mystery. Players piece together events through environmental clues.
To the Moon
A touching story-driven RPG.
To the Moon tells an emotional story through simple gameplay. The game focuses on memory, love, and fulfilling a dying wish.
Unpacking
A relaxing puzzle about personal spaces.
Unpacking tells a story through objects and rooms. Players unpack belongings and learn about a character’s life without dialogue.
Virginia
A cinematic psychological thriller.
Virginia is a narrative-driven experience inspired by television dramas. The story is told without dialogue, using visuals and music.
What Remains of Edith Finch
A collection of emotional short stories.
What Remains of Edith Finch explores the history of a family through interactive vignettes. Each story offers a unique gameplay experience.
